      • generatelAActions

        public Vector<IAResult> generatelAActions(Enemy currentEnemy,
                                 int map_width,
                                 int map_height,
                                 Vector<Cell> specialCell,
                                 Vector<Enemy> enemies,
                                 Vector<Character> players,
                                 Vector<Obstacle> obstacles,
                                 int difficulty,
                                 Tablero tablero)
        Main AI decision method
        Parameters:
        currentEnemy - Current enemy to perform
        map_width - Width of the current scenario
        map_height - Heigh of the current scenario
        specialCell - Special cell in the current scenario
        enemies - NPCs in the current scenario
        players - Players in the current scenario
        obstacles - Obstacles in the current scenario
        difficulty - Level
        tablero - The current board.
        Returns:
        resultados Actions performed
